code: import{UnavailabilityError}from'expo-modules-core';import NotificationScheduler from'./NotificationScheduler';import{parseTrigger}from'./scheduleNotificationAsync';export default async function getNextTriggerDateAsync(trigger){if(!NotificationScheduler.getNextTriggerDateAsync){throw new UnavailabilityError('ExpoNotifications','getNextTriggerDateAsync');}return await NotificationScheduler.getNextTriggerDateAsync(parseTrigger(trigger));}
